mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookreview (isbn, bookName, bookIntro, bookImg, bookUrl, userSeq, bookRev) VALUES(#{isbn}, #{title}, #{bookIntro}, #{bookImg}, #{bookUrl}, #{userSeq}, #{bookRev})
mapper.select: SELECT b.reviewSeq, b.bookName, b.bookImg, b.enrollDate, u.userId FROM bookreview b, userinfo u WHERE b.userSeq = u.userSeq ORDER BY b.reviewSeq desc

SELECT b.reviewSeq, b.bookName, b.bookImg, b.enrollDate, u.userId, (select count(*) from bookreview_like bi where bi.reviewSeq = b.reviewSeq) as cnt FROM bookreview b, userinfo u WHERE b.userSeq = u.userSeq AND b.userSeq = #{value} ORDER BY b.reviewSeq desc

SELECT r.reviewSeq, r.isbn, r.bookName, r.bookIntro, r.bookImg, r.bookUrl, r.userSeq, r.bookRev, r.enrollDate, u.userId FROM bookreview r, userinfo u WHERE r.userSeq = u.userSeq AND reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
